mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wf_internal_group (f_id, f_apply_id, f_apply_user_id, f_group_id, f_expired_at, f_created_at) VALUES(#{id}, #{applyID}, #{applyUserID}, #{groupID}, #{expiredAt}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: update t_wf_internal_group set f_expired_at=#{expired_at} where f_apply_id=#{apply_id}
